page.title: 02An Outline of the Area
page.content: This block covers an area some 7 miles north of{Cardiff,}the capital city of Wales. Its main feature is the busy market town of Caerphilly. An excellent{road network links the area to all parts - the M.4 being only 10 minutes away. Regular direct rail connections to Cardiff make travel by train easy and convenient. Caerphilly is famous for its{castle}and its{cheese. The castle, second largest in Europe, is a major attraction with its 'leaning tower' which is 9 feet out of the perpendicular. Unfortunately, the making of the well-known Caerphilly Cheese now belongs to the past.
